sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>On zboot or upgrade, Index sys_embedded_help_content table. This helps users with search results from sys_embedded_help_content table in help panel. This is required when user upgrades to new release.</description> <name>Index sys_embedded_help_content table</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[gs.log("Fix Script: Index sys_embedded_help_content table"); if (!pm.isZboot() && new sn_ais.StatusApi().isAisEnabled()) { new sn_ais.IndexEvent().indexTable("sys_embedded_help_content"); new sn_ais.Synchronizer().publishProfile("help_panel_search_profile"); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-08-20 10:05:07</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b897c4d25b0230109779b9a23381c703</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Index sys_embedded_help_content table</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Help and Guidance Backend" source="com.glide.sn_help">cab9f0283cf1311068bcf327dfe37f11</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b897c4d25b0230109779b9a23381c703</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-07 09:56:11</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
